string.text:
A piece of meat high in both nutrition and radiation. The scientists have enough samples already, which limits its use as a commodity. Source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] Х %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] Х %c[0,140,140,140] not cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] Х %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] Х %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +646 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+2%)

An ordinary rusty bolt, often used by novices and experienced stalkers alike to build safe pathways among anomalies.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,140,140,140] Х %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item

A long, frayed tail, presumably from a local horse. The scientists have enough samples already, which limits its use as a commodity.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen

%c[0,170,170,170]A long brown cloak. It looks old and worn, a lot of patches and seams indicate numerous repairs. It is best to use with a gas mask or a closed breathing system. Initially, one mount for additional modules was installed.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]FEATURES:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Lightweight Equipment
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Usable for %c[0,170,170,170] equipment repair(+24%)
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Head:
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Torso: %c[0,170,170,170]I
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Shoulders: %c[0,170,170,170]I
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Filter: %c[0,170,170,170]None
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Gloves: %c[0,170,170,170]None
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Boots: %c[0,170,170,170]I
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Knees and shin: %c[0,170,170,170]I
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Feet: %c[0,170,170,170]I

A trenchcoat modified with common materials in the Zone, featuring a twin-layered rubberised cloth with Plexiglas lining and built-in body armor. Despite the fact that the body armor is often strained by anything beyond even pistol bullets, the suit enjoys great popularity due to its low cost and modification potential.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] light armor
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Usable for %c[0,170,170,170] equipment repair (+34%)
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Head:
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Torso: %c[0,170,170,170]IIIA
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Shoulders: %c[0,170,170,170]IIIA
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Filter: %c[0,170,170,170]III
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Gloves: %c[0,170,170,170]None
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Hips: %c[0,170,170,170]III
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Knees and shin: %c[0,170,170,170]II
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Feet: %c[0,170,170,170]IIIA
A homemade flamethrower, prone to jamming and having poor range. Its haphazard design suggests it was made in the zone by a disturbed stalker.
Boiled animal fat, diesel and bits of melted rubber. Makes for a sticky, napalm-like substance when lit.

The M68 lightweight grenade packs a considerable amount of shrapnel and is popular among paratroopers, marines and special NATO forces. Fitted with the M213 fuse, it can be worn and rapidly deployed by hooking the trigger lever to the equipment belt.

The Gagarin standard issue combat suit is the certified combat outfit for all standard army units operating within the Zone. Fitted with an external insulating coating and a closed-cycle breathing system using a modified GP-17 gas mask, it offers moderate protection against the Zone's climate. The Gagarin is built off of the Fort Redoubt T7 combat vest, and provides excellent shrapnel protection without reducing the wearers mobility. It's disadvantage is how much it weighs. It has three slots for additional modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]FEATURES:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Reinforced Armor
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] equipment repair (+48%)

The light armored "RS-1B" suit was developed by the Clear Sky group based on the existing ChN-1 combat suit. Besides some aesthetic modifications, the two are nearly identical in terms of protection. It offers little in terms of protection from the Zone's anomalies, but it's armor may stop shrapnel and other small projectiles.

I'm rolling the leaves, won't take long.
Sewing this sleeping bag will take a while.
Making this backpack will take a while.
I'm making the cartridges, might take a bit of time.

Tobacco, filters and paper, everything needed to make cigarettes. This should make about six to seven. 
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140]Crafted Items

Homemade 12 gauge shell filled with 6 mm shot. Highly lethal at close range. Only suitable for use with smoothbore weapons.

%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIAL:
 
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] expanding cloud of pellets, short eff. range

Powder, shells and shot - everything needed to make 12x70 buckshot rounds. Has enough to make 40 rounds.

An armoured plate carved from a SEVA suit. Able to stop small bullets and gives some elemental resistance. Can be used for repairs.

Springs, frames and stocks designed for submachineguns. This could be used for repairs.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] submachine gun repairs(+6%)

A modified radio, designed to be able to communicate with other radios yet filter out as much interference as possible. 
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Technological Item

Psi-Dogs have powerful physic abilities, for example, the ability to induce "hallucinations" upon prey. These illusions are extremely convincing, often capable of inflicting very real trama through currently unknown means. Interestedly, scientists say that while they've identified the region of the brain responsible for the psionic abilities, it's evident that the region is "juvenile" in both development and evolutionary potential. Scientists will pay generously for samples of such tissues. 
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] High value

A mixture of tablets and solvents proven effective in neutralising radiation and bio-hazardous materials. Good for decontaminating items.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140]Decontaminates items
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140]Homemade

Specialised kit for replacing shotgun barrels in the field. Includes all tools and barrels.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon repair

A German strong herbal liqueur. Made with 56 components and aged for 12 months in oak barrels. The label of the bottle depicts a deer with a cross on it's horns. According to legend, the deer was seen by Saint Hubert, the patron saint of hunters.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Strong alcoholic beverage
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Causes dizziness
